markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Shooting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3217) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Gunslinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=114)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Shooting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3216)

</column>

---

You gain one [gunslinger feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=20/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your gunslinger level is equal to half your level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another gunslinger feat.
name: Advanced Shooting
